data.text:
Other currency selection:

Currency

Currency details FRA France -1959 (->FRF) [Old french franc / AF]

Label of currency FRA is Old french franc.

Currency code FRA is associated to France -1959, flag is used on this site for it.

Short code is AF.

Amounts in this currency have up to 0 decimal.

It is mainly associated to country or zone France.

Currency FRA doesn't have legal tender anymore, it was replaced by currency FRF since 1960-01-01.

Currency FRA is pegged with currency EUR since 1960-01-01, the fixed price is 1 EUR=655.957 FRA.

We recorded price on this currency since 1953-08-10

Current annual inflation rate for currency FRA is 2.151 %.

List of countries that are using or were using currency FRA :
